attributes.action: Cease and relinquish no further, British Control or rights to self determination, to Europe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Daily the rights and entitlements of the British people are being surrendered without consultation or permission.
This Government will cease forthwith, and should they surrender any further control of Britains right to Self Government and self determination,or any other fundamental right,to Europe be charged then with treason.
